attributes.action: require the MPs of English constituencies be paid 25% less in salary and allowances because they no longer represent Scotland, one of the four countries of the Union, and should not be paid the same now as they were before devolution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If anyone loses one quarter of their area of responsibility then they should lose one quarter of their pay and allowances.  Natural justice!
